doc:
Stanley Bennett Clay https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stanley_Bennett_Clay 0 Stanley Bennett Clay (born March 18, 1950) is an American actor, writer, playwright, stage and film director, and producer based out of Manhattan, New York. He is best known for his acting work in the films All the President's Men (1976), Minstrel Man (1977) and I, Robot (2004).Though a lifelong actor, Stanley Bennett Clay has stated he prefers directing and producing: "I've always been the one in charge. I like the responsibility. At 12, I produced my first show: wrote it, composed the music, directed it, sold tickets, controlled the concessions—lemonade and cookies—and starred in it in my parents' living room. People from the neighborhood lined up to see it. Yeah, it's about control. I'm doing my own things, doing them the way I want them done." Stanley_Bennett_Clay ( born March_18_,_1950 ) is an_American_actor , writer_,_playwright_,_stage_and_film_director , and producer based out of Manhattan , New_York . He is_best_known for his_acting_work in the_films All the_President 's_Men_(_1976_) , Minstrel_Man_(_1977 ) and I , Robot_(_2004_) . Though a_lifelong_actor , Stanley_Bennett_Clay has_stated he prefers_directing_and_producing : " I 've_always_been the_one in charge . I like the_responsibility . At 12 , I produced my_first_show : wrote it , composed the_music , directed it , sold tickets , controlled the_concessions — lemonade_and_cookies — and starred in it in my_parents '_living_room . People from the_neighborhood lined up to_see it . Yeah , it 's about control . I 'm_doing my_own_things , doing them the_way I want them done .
